alert.note: Alert for Hampton, Poquoson; Newport News (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 3:28PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of , the City of Hampton and the City of Newport News through 400 PM EDT... At 328 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Christopher Newport University, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newport News, Hampton, Hampton University, Christopher Newport University, Patrick Henry Field, Northampton, Denbigh, Fort Monroe, Beaconsdale, Phoebus, Oriana, Hilton Village, Raleigh Terrace, Newport News Golf Course, Oyster Point and Menchville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong wind gusts are possible with these storms. These wind gusts are capable of knocking down tree limbs, small or weakened trees, and blowing around trash cans, potted plants, lawn furniture, and other light outdoor objects.
